fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Searing Glare**: Choose a player during the day to focus the scorching rays of the sun on them. This player will be roleblocked and doused in sunlight. If this player performs any action during the night, they will be dealt a Basic attack worth of damage due to sunburn.
- **Heatwave**: During the night, you can initiate a heatwave that affects the entire town. This prevents any healing or protection abilities from working. Additionally, players with investigative abilities will receive inaccurate results due to the distortion caused by the heat.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Solar Infusion**: During Tuesday and Friday, the intensity of the sun empowers you. Your attacks become Unstoppable on those nights.
- **Melted Defense**: You are immune to roleblocks and basic attacks during nights when the sun is at its peak (Tuesday and Friday), as the sheer heat makes it impossible to hinder you.
